visual_attributes.lighting: Natural lighting with modern ceiling lights
visual_attributes.texture: Smooth marble flooring, matte cupboard doors, shiny gold mirror frame

indian_context.space_utilization: Efficient use of space with clear demarcation between different zones
indian_context.cultural_significance: Use of traditional elements like the circular mirror and wooden doors, combined with modern adaptations and a clean, open layout

analysis.description: The interior space is a modern Indian entrance hall with a contemporary design. It features a marble floor, wooden doors, and a green and white shoe rack with metal handles. A circular mirror with a gold frame adds a traditional touch, while modern hanging lights provide illumination. The kitchen area in the background showcases a pink cabinet and white marble countertop, creating a blend of traditional and modern elements. The space is organized with a clear view of the kitchen and a demarcation between the entrance and living areas.

metadata.budget_indicator: Mid-range, utilizing materials like marble and glass in the shoe rack and cupboard, as well as modern lighting fixtures.
metadata.space_type: Residential, specifically a home with a focus on interior design.
metadata.functionality: Entryway space with an integrated kitchen area, designed for both aesthetic appeal and practical use.
metadata.indian_specific: Traditional elements like the circular mirror and wooden doors are incorporated into a modern design setting.
